<a id="Node3DGizmo"></a>

# Node3DGizmo

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorNode3DGizmo](EditorNode3DGizmo.md)

Abstract class to expose editor gizmos for [Node3D](Node3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This abstract class helps connect the [Node3D](Node3D.md) scene with the editor-specific [EditorNode3DGizmo](EditorNode3DGizmo.md) class.

\ **Node3DGizmo** by itself has no exposed API, refer to [Node3D.add_gizmo()](Node3D.md#Node3D_method_add_gizmo) and pass it an [EditorNode3DGizmo](EditorNode3DGizmo.md) instance.
